text.author: Steve Bell
text.description: Media tycoon's reign as Italy's longest-serving PM nears end after he loses majority in lower house of parliament
text.title: Steve Bell on Silvio Berlusconi's decision to resign

main.p: Steve Bell on Silvio Berlusconi's decision to resign 09.11.2011 Steve Bell Photograph: Steve Bell for the GuardianIllustration: © Steve Bell 201109.11.2011 Steve Bell Photograph: Steve Bell for the GuardianIllustration: © Steve Bell 2011Explore more on these topicsSilvio BerlusconiGuardian Opinion cartoonItaly
